fluency.description: Speech is understandable with some pauses; rate 72 wpm; repetition accuracy 53%.
fluency.description_cn: 整体可理解；语速约 72 词/分钟；复述准确率约 53% 。

pronunciation.description: Pronunciation is generally intelligible; rhythm and vowel quality can improve.
pronunciation.description_cn: 发音整体清晰；节奏与元音质量仍可提升。
